title: PBE Sign up Error 500
body: I've been wanting to try to sign up for a PBE account, but every time I go to the sign up website I keep getting the message Error 500

replies.body: There shouldn't be any problems accessing the PBE site.  Make sure you are signed in the correct account (located on the top right of the page), and using the direct link to the application site- [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  Hope that helps!
The direct link still gives an error 500
even after using the link i get [this error message](http://imgur.com/a/usLGb)
There is a problem please don't skip these posts with a "It should be working". It doesn't work and you should really look into it. It's 2 months since this discuss opened and I get that error
I also keep getting it regardless, wish someone would fix this.
Same thing is still happening. I would like to check on my pbe status. :(
I am getting the same thing too :( {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Bump, same thing happening to me.
